entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
